title: A land at a Strategic Place
details:
FACING CHANDRIKA KUMARATUNGA MW.

> 1 Minute drive to
Dr. Neville Fernando Hospital,
CINEC Campus,
Horizon International School ,
SAITM Campus
> Walking distance to Chandrika Kumaratunga Mw. Jogging track & Open Gym
>1.5km to SLIIT
>2 km to Kothalawala Highway Entrance
> Water Supply and Electricity Supply
> A main road to Ambathale is in progress ( Carpeting is in progress )
> Nice View
>Fence covering the land
> Two entry roads to the land
